paragraph:
President Donald Trump travels to Pittsburgh in the wake a mass shooting at a synagogue.President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump visit Pittsburgh following the deadly shooting at the Tree of Life Synagogue. While some welcome the visit, other Jewish groups have said that Mr Trump would not be welcome. Newshour brought together two rabbis on either side of the debate.Also in the programme: An ex-nurse in Germany has admitted at the start of his trial that he murdered 100 patients, and a constitutional crisis in Sri Lanka.Image: US President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump. Credit: Mandel Ngan/AFP/Getty Images.
